mapper.insert: INSERT INTO options (id, option_name, display_name, option_value, description, customized, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{optionName}, #{displayName}, #{optionValue}, #{description}, #{customized}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE options SET option_name = #{optionName}, display_name = #{displayName}, option_value = #{optionValue}, description = #{description}, customized = #{customized}, updated_at = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW(3)) * 1000 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM options WHERE id = #{id} and customized = 1
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM options WHERE option_name = #{optionName}
